Treatmants

We offer advanced technology treatments that utilize high end equipments: microcurrent, high frequency current, ultrasound, low intensity radio frequency, and microdermabrasion. These anti aging methods combat fine lines, wrinkles, sagging skin, hyperpigmented areas and small imperfections of the skin.

Facials

Facials contribute to healthy appearance of skin and increased sense of well being. They consist of cleansing, exfoliation, steaming, extractions, massage, hydration and nourishment with serums, vitamins, moisturizers and aromatherapy.

Well being

Reiki is an ancient hands on healing method that helps with stress, metal clarity, emotional blockages, re-coalescence, post surgery recovery and the function of visceral organs. Crystal back massage relieves tension in the shoulder and back muscles and provides energy healing.

ABOUT ME

My name is Roza Kurciska. I was born, raised and educated in Macedonia. I finished medical school and specialized in dermatology. I owned a medical spa in Macedonia for 15 years, and have continued working in the spa business since I moved to the US in 2003. I always had an afinty for alternative medicine and in 2005 I was initiated as a Reiki first degree practitioner. And since then I achieved the second and third degrees. I am a strong believer in skin care and alternative healing methods, and I combine both in my practice.
